pastInspirations.q: The world doesn't always give you want, but it often gives you what you need.
pastInspirations.h:
“The world doesn't always give you want, but it often gives you what you need.” —
Naval Ravikant

pastInspirations.q: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
pastInspirations.h:
“Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.” —
Marilyn Monroe

pastInspirations.q: The only problem we really have is we think we're not supposed to have problems! Problems call us to higher level- - face & solve them now!
pastInspirations.h:
“The only problem we really have is we think we're not supposed to have problems! Problems call us to higher level- - face & solve them now!” —
Tony Robbins

pastInspirations.q: Wherever there is danger, there lurks opportunity; wherever there is opportunity, there lurks danger. The two are inseparable.
pastInspirations.h:
“Wherever there is danger, there lurks opportunity; wherever there is opportunity, there lurks danger. The two are inseparable.” —
Earl Nightingale

pastInspirations.q: Be grateful for what you have now, and nothing should be taken for granted.
pastInspirations.h:
“Be grateful for what you have now, and nothing should be taken for granted.” —
Roy T. Bennett

pastInspirations.q: To affect the quality of the day, that is the highest of arts.
pastInspirations.h:
“To affect the quality of the day, that is the highest of arts.” —
Henry David Thoreau

pastInspirations.q: If it's not broken, tinker with it till you find out how it works.
pastInspirations.h:
“If it's not broken, tinker with it till you find out how it works.” —
Bob Proctor

pastInspirations.q: Change is hard at first, messy in the middle and gorgeous at the end.
pastInspirations.h:
“Change is hard at first, messy in the middle and gorgeous at the end.” —
Robin Sharma

pastInspirations.q: The ego wants comfort and certainty. The soul wants to live fully.
pastInspirations.h:
“The ego wants comfort and certainty. The soul wants to live fully.” —
Maxime Lagace

pastInspirations.q: I find the best way to love someone is not to change them, but instead, help them reveal the greatest version of themselves.
pastInspirations.h:
“I find the best way to love someone is not to change them, but instead, help them reveal the greatest version of themselves.” —
Steve Maraboli

pastInspirations.q: Live calmly. The time will come when the flowers bloom by themselves.
pastInspirations.h:
“Live calmly. The time will come when the flowers bloom by themselves.” —
Zen Proverb

pastInspirations.q: The only thing more frustrating than slanderers is those foolish enough to listen to them.
pastInspirations.h:
“The only thing more frustrating than slanderers is those foolish enough to listen to them.” —
Criss Jami

pastInspirations.q: Awaken. Take heed, do not squander your life.
pastInspirations.h:
“Awaken. Take heed, do not squander your life.” —
Dogen

pastInspirations.q: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
pastInspirations.h:
“You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.” —
Les Brown

pastInspirations.q: The time is now, the place is here. Stay in the present.
pastInspirations.h:
“The time is now, the place is here. Stay in the present.” —
Dan Millman

pastInspirations.q: Maybe you are searching among the branches, for what only appears in the roots.
pastInspirations.h:
“Maybe you are searching among the branches, for what only appears in the roots.” —
Rumi

pastInspirations.q: The major difference between the big shot and the little shot is the big shot is just a little shot who kept on shooting.
pastInspirations.h:
“The major difference between the big shot and the little shot is the big shot is just a little shot who kept on shooting.” —
Zig Ziglar

pastInspirations.q: A life without a cause is a life without effect.
pastInspirations.h:
“A life without a cause is a life without effect.” —
Paulo Coelho

pastInspirations.q: The consequences of today are determined by the actions of the past. To change your future, alter your decisions today.
pastInspirations.h:
“The consequences of today are determined by the actions of the past. To change your future, alter your decisions today.” —
Unknown

pastInspirations.q: Don't give up the fight, Stand up for your rights.
pastInspirations.h:
“Don't give up the fight, Stand up for your rights.” —
Bob Marley

pastInspirations.q: The heart wants what it wants. There's no logic.
pastInspirations.h:
“The heart wants what it wants. There's no logic. ” —
Woody Allen

pastInspirations.q: The chief cause of failure and unhappiness is trading what you want most for what you want right now.
pastInspirations.h:
“The chief cause of failure and unhappiness is trading what you want most for what you want right now.” —
Zig Ziglar

pastInspirations.q: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
pastInspirations.h:
“Believe you can and you're halfway there.” —
Theodore Roosevelt

pastInspirations.q: Nearly every crisis seems to be the worst one, but after it's over, it isn't so bad.
pastInspirations.h:
“Nearly every crisis seems to be the worst one, but after it's over, it isn't so bad.” —
Harry S. Truman

pastInspirations.q: Remain calm, serene, always in command of yourself. You will then find out how easy it is to get along.
pastInspirations.h:
“Remain calm, serene, always in command of yourself. You will then find out how easy it is to get along. ” —
Paramahansa Yogananda

pastInspirations.q: One always begins to forgive a place as soon as it's left behind.
pastInspirations.h:
“One always begins to forgive a place as soon as it's left behind.” —
Charles Dickens

pastInspirations.q: All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers.
pastInspirations.h:
“All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers. ” —
Orison Swett Marden

pastInspirations.q: Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you.
pastInspirations.h:
“Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you.” —
John Wooden

inspirationOfDay.q: The time is always right to do what is right.
inspirationOfDay.h:
“The time is always right to do what is right.” —
Martin Luther King, Jr.
